label: Pocket_Instructions
text: It is recommended to put your phone in your pocket in upside down position so that the proximity sensor of your phone remains as close as possible to the sides of your pocket or purse. In simple words try to keep the front and top side of your phone close to any side of your pocket Or purse Put your phone in your pocket in upside down position as shown below Press the Power button to activate the protection How To Use Pocket Mode
